title: Fact Check: News of complete lockdown in Madhya Pradesh is false | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
As COVID-19 cases continue to rise in the country, messages of complete lockdown in certain states are being circulated on social media.

One such message claims that the state of Madhya Pradesh is going under complete lockdown from July 16 to July 30, 2020.

NewsMobile fact-checked the above post and found the claim to be false.

We ran a search and found a tweet by Madhya Pradesh Chief Minister Shivraj Singh Chauhan stating that the news of lockdown in Madhya Pradesh is a rumor.

“There is news on various social media platforms that a lockdown is being imposed in Madhya Pradesh. This news is completely baseless. No such decision has been taken by the Madhya Pradesh government regarding the lockdown in the state, ” he tweeted on July 15, 2020.

Hence, from the above information, we can conclude that the post is circulation in false.
